actions.text: On agreeing to the Ros-Lehtinen amendment (A011) Agreed to by voice vote.

description: Amendment exempts legal permanent residents, who cannot take the U.S. naturalization exam because of physical or development disability or mental impairment, from being denied public benefits.
purpose: An amendment to exempt legal permanent residents, who cannot take the U.S. naturalization exam because of physical or development disability or mental impairment, from being denied public benefits.
